      • readCreditRequests

        @GetMapping("/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> readCreditRequests()
        Returns a list of all credit requests that are not marked as suspicious
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity - Contains either a 200(OK) with the list of credit requests OR a 400(BAD REQUEST)

      • readCreditRequest

        @GetMapping("/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> readCreditRequest​(@PathVariable("id")
                                                                                  java.lang.String id)
        Returns a specific credit request
        Parameters:
        id - - Id of the credit request to be returned
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity - Contains either a 200(OK) with the credit request object OR a 400(BAD REQUEST)

      • confirmStatus

        @PutMapping("/confirm_status")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> confirmStatus​(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                              @Valid CreditRequestStatusConfirmationDto confirmationDto)
        Updates the status of a credit request that is IN_BEHANDELING and adds a note to the credit requests feedback document
        Parameters:
        confirmationDto - - Dto containing the id of the credit request to be updated, the new status and the note
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity - Contains either a 200(OK) with the new status and the credit request OR a 400(BAD REQUEST) when the credit request to be updated does not exist
